about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-LBT02/SP01 Astesice×Live, Kairi
- D-LBT02/SP02 Coming Beauty, Herminia
- D-LBT02/SP03 Scintillate Rays, Ophelia
- D-LBT02/SP04 MiMish, Fortia
- D-LBT02/SP05 Canon of Overlai- D-spinning, Dietlinde
- D-LBT02/SP06 Privilege Potential, Phenael
- D-LBT02/SP07 Hoppin' Stellar, Melty
- D-LBT02/SP08 Mya Mya Ensemble, Nala
- D-LBT02/SP09 Definite Growth, Rugena
- D-LBT02/SP10 Symphonic Sky, Lyudmila
- D-LBT02/SP11 Sweet×Sweet
- D-LBT02/SP12 Challenge to Self, Trudie
- D-LBT02/SP13 Enveloping Compassion, Torquel
- D-LBT02/SP14 Bathing Fountain, Terues
- D-LBT02/SP15 Detour Together, Elvi
- D-LBT02/SP16 Motivation Aplenty! Arlette
- D-LBT02/SP17 Along with Smiles, Geezya
- D-LBT02/SP18 Aim for the Horizon, Piael
- D-LBT02/SP19 Grazioso Prince, Meredith
- D-LBT02/SP20 Sound in the Wind, Ducayla
- D-LBT02/SP21 Beware of Overeating! Eileen
- D-LBT02/SP22 Next Step, Laplume
- D-LBT02/SP23 Spokesperson of Heavenly Voice, Herjuel
- D-LBT02/SP24 Eternally Indistinguishable Aubade, Irene
- D-LBT02/SP25 Burgeoning Tone, Signe
- D-LBT02/SP26 Head to the Pinnacle, Katlein
- D-LBT02/SP27 Attract Peach, Ertines
- D-LBT02/SP28 Sniping Eyeful, Leranje
- D-LBT02/SP29 Cutie Topic, Rabeena
- D-LBT02/SP30 MiMish, Rikashenna
- D-LBT02/SP31 MiMish, Azhachir
- D-LBT02/SP32 MiMish, Tubbylila
- D-LBT02/SP33 Precious Tune, Edwige
- D-LBT02/SP34 Transparent Snowy Night, Beretoi
- D-LBT02/SP35 Snowskip, Palvi

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

package_groups.title: Buy Cardfight!! Vanguard DD: Rare Card Set 07 [D-LBT02]: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: One of set of each SP version card.
